Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Wish there was a way to give 0 stars. The bartender was a big time racist. Lots of tourists come to Amsterdam so it's obvious that their vaccination QR code will not be accepted by the administration here but places still accept you after ‚Ä¶

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Turkish carpets on the bar tables, great little bar, oodles of character with stained glass windows, memorabilia all over the walls and a nice touch with Turkish style carpets as the table covers, barman was v friendly, football happened to be on which appears normal, clientele was 50:50 local:visitors

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Stumbled in here to escape the cold and what a surprise it was! Fantastic service and great selection of local snacks and food. Also offer a good selection of local beers. Love the decor and the vibe. Will definitely come again.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: My wife and I were just in Amsterdam (Jan. 2, 2017) looking for a small, quintessential Dutch pub frequented by locats when we stumbled upon the Cafe De Gouden Florijn. It's charming, intimate and wholly Dutch. Try an authentic Dutch beer ‚Ä¶

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Super authentic bar, great atmosphere, great interior - especially the carpet on the table.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Really nice place, it's an old bar, like a Dutch "cantina", near to the center, with handcrafted tap Dutch beers at 3.5 or 4 euros and traditional Dutch snacks. Have terrace too, and the bartender it's polite.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Today I went to this bar for the first time. The bar itself is quite nice, however, the bartender was really unfriendly! He was so rude that for the first time on my life I took the time to write a review about a place. I am never coming back to this place and I will tell everyone I know to never go to this place.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Great bar. It's a local hang out. We always stop here when. We got to Langpura Indonesian down the street for dinner....

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Old style classic Amsterdam bar. Unfortunately there are not that many left but this one still going strong.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Went in for lunch , no customers at all. Asked to eat and was told that depending what I order its possible. I ordered an item and was told no, and immediately suggested to go to a competitor business rather than see what is possible. Terrible service.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Great bar that's close to the canals and great staff.  Niko the bartender is a hell of a barkeep and pours great beers. Thanks for the good times Niko!

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Cute little bar, amazing cider, And good prices!

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text:
Welcoming old school pub.
Nice choice of beers and has the football on the TV

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Charming bar. A must see for every football fan

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: One of my favorite places we stopped for a drink in am of Amsterdam. Absolutely dripping with character, cozy and fun. Wait staff was skeptical at first but once we ordered a couple of drinks and broke out our smiles, everyone was super ‚Ä¶

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Loved it, an authentic Dutch bar serving local beers. A small menu is available as is coffee. Great to hear people chatting and laughing. We loved the atmosphere.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Another haunt of mine nice place to visit

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Pub filled with mostly locals. My wife and I just happened to go to this pub and were pleasantly surprised. They had a good selection of fine Belgian beers, and they were the cheapest around. Nice atmosphere and kind staff.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Nice Amsterdam "Bruin Caf√©", however turning it into a sportsbar with 4 screens casting permanent sports is so not done. Just stick with turning on the tv, when there's an Ajax or Orange game on, not limited to the Orange football teams though.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Awesome location, very nice and warm people. We watched the world championship in a superfine atmosphere. We wish Nico and his friends all the best.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: A great place if you want to meet locals - this place is social class and age agnostic and a greatly diverse group of people meet here in the evenings. Besides beer and spirits you can also get some typical Dutch fingerfood.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text:
This is apparently the smallest bar in Amsterdam. The owner is a good laugh and keeps you well entertained.
I would definitely go back.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Cosy little Amsterdam Cafe. Needs more fried snacks, like vlammetjes ie mixed door moe stars. Have a nice beer menu.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: If you are looking for a cafe showing soccer games, this is a good place. Very homey decoration.  Nice bitterballen for appetizer while you watching

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Every time I come to Amsterdam I have a few beers in this bar. Fantastic quintessential Dutch bar with carpets on the tables.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Very small but interesting bar with a friendly owner who built it 32 years ago and has obvious pride! A great find!

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: We had there gin tonic on kingsday and the girls were super nice. Cool classic corner bar

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Superb corner bar. Service is excellent and friendly. Good choice of tasty beer and outrageous location.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: One of the best bars I‚Äôve been in, in a long time!!! The bar tender is lovely :)

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Proper welcoming and cosy Dutch bar. Definitely happy to stumble in!

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Friendly atmosphere. Good selection of drinks, everything is calm and cosy.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Friendly and charming bar staff. Lovely beer and yummy cheese.

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: The most awsome little homie pub, always welcome

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Great athmosphere and delicious Jopen beer!

Name: De Gouden Florijn
Review Text: Cozy pub, cash only. Great place to duck in to
